verses.verse: My God, <S%H410><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> why have you forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me? <S%H7350><s%> Why are you so far from helping <S%H3444><s%> me, <S%H1697><s%> and from the words of my groaning? <S%H7581><s%>
My God, <S%H430><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> in the daytime, <S%H3119><s%> but you don't <S%H6030><s%> answer; in the night season, <S%H3915><s%> and am not silent. <S%H1747><s%>
But you are holy, <S%H6918><s%> you who inhabit <S%H3427><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> in you. <S%H982><s%> They trusted, and you delivered them. <S%H6403><s%>
They cried <S%H2199><s%> to you, <S%H4422><s%> and were delivered. They trusted <S%H982><s%> in you, <S%H954><s%> and were not disappointed.
But I am a worm, <S%H8438><s%> and no man; <S%H376><s%> a reproach <S%H2781><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> and despised <S%H959><s%> by the people. <S%H120><s%>
All those who see <S%H7200><s%> me mock me. <S%H3932><s%> They insult me with <S%H6358><s%> their lips. <S%H8193><s%> They shake <S%H5128><s%> their heads, <S%H7218><s%> saying,
"He trusts <S%H1556><s%> in Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> let him deliver <S%H6403><s%> him. <S%H6403><s%> Let him rescue him, <S%H2654><s%> since he delights in him."
But you brought <S%H1518><s%> me out of the womb. <S%H990><s%> You made me trust <S%H982><s%> at my mother <S%H517><s%>'s breasts. <S%H7699><s%>
I was thrown <S%H7993><s%> on you from my mother <S%H7358><s%>'s womb. You are my God <S%H410><s%> since my mother <S%H517><s%> bore me. <S%H990><s%>
Don't <S%H7368><s%> be far from me, <S%H6869><s%> for trouble is near. <S%H7138><s%> For there is none to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H47><s%> Strong bulls of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> have encircled me. <S%H3803><s%>
They open <S%H6475><s%> their mouths <S%H6310><s%> wide against me, <S%H738><s%> lions tearing <S%H2963><s%> prey and roaring. <S%H7580><s%>

I am poured out <S%H8210><s%> like water. <S%H4325><s%> All my bones <S%H6106><s%> are out of joint. <S%H6504><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is like wax; <S%H1749><s%> it is melted <S%H4549><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> me. <S%H4578><s%>

My strength <S%H3581><s%> is dried up <S%H3001><s%> like a potsherd. <S%H2789><s%> My tongue <S%H3956><s%> sticks <S%H1692><s%> to the roof of my mouth. <S%H4455><s%> You have brought <S%H8239><s%> me into the dust <S%H6083><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>

For dogs <S%H3611><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H5712><s%> A company of evildoers <S%H7489><s%> have enclosed <S%H5362><s%> me. <S%H3738><s%> They have pierced my hands <S%H3027><s%> and feet. <S%H7272><s%>
I can count <S%H5608><s%> all of my bones. <S%H6106><s%> They look <S%H5027><s%> and stare at me. <S%H7200><s%>
They divide <S%H2505><s%> my garments <S%H899><s%> among them. <S%H5307><s%> They cast lots <S%H1486><s%> for my clothing. <S%H3830><s%>
But don't <S%H7368><s%> be far off, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. You are my help: <S%H360><s%> hurry <S%H2363><s%> to help me. <S%H5833><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> my precious <S%H3173><s%> life from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the dog. <S%H3611><s%>
Save <S%H3467><s%> me from the lion <S%H738><s%>'s mouth! <S%H6310><s%> Yes, <S%H7161><s%> from the horns of the wild oxen, <S%H7214><s%> you have answered me. <S%H6030><s%>
I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> to my brothers. <S%H251><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> I will praise you. <S%H1984><s%>

You who fear <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> him! <S%H2233><s%> All you descendants of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> him! <S%H1481><s%> Stand in awe of him, <S%H2233><s%> all you descendants of Israel! <S%H3478><s%>

For he has not despised <S%H959><s%> nor abhorred <S%H8262><s%> the affliction <S%H6039><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> Neither has he hidden <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from him; <S%H7768><s%> but when he cried to him, <S%H8085><s%> he heard.
Of you comes my praise <S%H8416><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly. <S%H6951><s%> I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> before those who fear him. <S%H3373><s%>

The humble <S%H6035><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%> They shall praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who seek <S%H1875><s%> after him. <S%H3824><s%> Let your hearts live <S%H2421><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>

All the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall remember <S%H2142><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> All the relatives <S%H4940><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> before you. <S%H6440><s%>
For the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s. He is the ruler <S%H4910><s%> over the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

All the rich <S%H1879><s%> ones of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and worship. <S%H7812><s%> All those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H5315><s%> even he who can't keep his soul alive. <S%H2421><s%>
Posterity <S%H2233><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him. <S%H1755><s%> Future generations shall be told <S%H5608><s%> about the Lord. <S%H136><s%>
They shall come <S%H935><s%> and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> that shall be born, <S%H3205><s%> for he has done it. <S%H6213><s%>
